name: temporaryAttribute(_:atCharacterIndex:longestEffectiveRange:in:)
desc: Returns the value for the temporary attribute of a character, and the maximum range it applies to.
declaration:

       atCharacterIndex location: Int, 
  longestEffectiveRange range: NSRangePointer?, 
                     in rangeLimit: NSRange) -> Any?
